description: This header file defines interfaces and constants related to Wi-Fi Simple Configuration (WSC) messages (M1 and M2) within the IEEE 1905.1/1a stack. It provides function prototypes for building, processing, and freeing WSC messages, as well as for determining message types. The file also includes licensing and copyright information.

methods.name: wscBuildM1
methods.description: Builds the M1 message for Wi-Fi Simple Configuration, returning a buffer to embed in a CMDU.

methods.name: wscProcessM2
methods.description: Processes the received M2 message, configuring the interface and cleaning up buffers.

methods.name: wscBuildM2
methods.description: Builds the M2 message in response to an M1, with conditional parameters based on profile if MULTIAP is defined.

methods.name: wscFreeM2
methods.description: Frees the memory allocated for the M2 message buffer.

methods.name: wscGetType
methods.description: Determines the type of WSC message (M1, M2, or Unknown) based on message content.
